# **Government Tender Announcement Exterior Retrofit II Garage CFHA Ottawa NCR**
 Government of Canada, Contract Award
=============================================================

### Project Overview
DEFENCE CONSTRUCTION CANADA (DCC) invites proposals for the Exterior Retrofit II Garage project, located in the National Capital Region, Ottawa.

### Project Details
The project includes, but is not limited to:

* Supply of labour, materials, supervision, and equipment necessary for exterior retrofit and slab replacement of 13 double garages, located at CFHA Ottawa, Ontario.

### Tender Requirements and Contract
The winning bidder must complete the project within the span of 160 calendar days from contract award and meet the specified completion deadline. The estimated total cost for this project is in the range of $612,693.90.

### Site Visit
A site visit will take place on November 8, 2022. Attendance is highly recommended.

### Tender Package Availability
The Tender Package is available for ordering on MERX, and also available for download from DCC's website.

### Bidding Process and Eligibility
To be eligible, bidders must have the required qualifications and follow the instructions provided in the Tender Package. Bidders who fail to adhere to the specified guidelines may be disqualified.

### Payment Commitment
DEFENCE CONSTRUCTION CANADA (DCC) now publicly discloses information on payments made to prime contractors. This ensures that subcontractors can expect timely payments.

### Important Notes
All amendments to the Tender Package should be obtained from MERX as the primary source. This guarantees that bidders receive the latest updates on project requirements.

### Contact Information
Please direct all inquiries and questions to the DCC Contracting Authority mentioned above. Failure to follow this instruction may result in the bidder's proposal being rejected.

### Related Documents
The STANDARD CONSTRUCTION CONTRACT DOCUMENTS FOR ELECTRONIC BIDDING will be provided as part of the Tender Package. Bidders can also download these documents from DCC's website.

| Document | Availability |
| --- | --- |
